name: LendingPoolCollateralManager
description: LendingPoolCollateralManager contract. Implements actions involving management of collateral in the protocol, the main one being the liquidations IMPORTANT This contract will run always via DELEGATECALL, through the LendingPool, so the chain of inheritance is the same as the LendingPool, to have compatible storage layouts*.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationCall
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when collateral value to loan rate is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUsedAsCollateralDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when collateral value to loan rate is changed.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveUsedAsCollateralEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when collateral value to loan rate is changed.

functionDecorators.name: liquidationCall
functionDecorators.description: Function to liquidate a position if its Health Factor drops below 1 - The caller (liquidator) covers `debtToCover` amount of debt of the user getting liquidated, and receives a proportionally amount of the `collateralAsset` plus a bonus to cover market risk.

parameterDecorators.name: collateralAsset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset used as collateral, to receive as result of the liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: debtAsset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying borrowed asset to be repaid with the liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower getting liquidated.

parameterDecorators.name: debtToCover
parameterDecorators.description: The debt amount of borrowed `asset` the liquidator wants to cover.

parameterDecorators.name: receiveAToken
parameterDecorators.description: `true` if the liquidators wants to receive the collateral aTokens, `false` if he wants to receive the underlying collateral asset directly*.
